title: Hotlap Heroes
notes: Steam shows Positive: 81% of 16 reviews. Small sample lowers confidence. Steam store highlights single-screen multiplayer and a smartphone/tablet controller app; 16 user reviews.
raw_comment: Top-down racing game for up to 8 local players. 2 keyboard players, up to 8 gamepads (XInput limit unverified), up to 8 phones as controllers. Shared screen.
